thread.title: Great Hotel in Bercy Village with Excellent Staff
thread.title_full: Great Hotel in Bercy Village with Excellent Staff - Review of Pullman Paris Centre - Bercy, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anne N
title: Great Hotel in Bercy Village with Excellent Staff
text:
We just came back from Paris and stayed at the Bercy Village Pullman. Julian in the front desk was just amazing. He was so helpful. Can't say enough about how wonderful all the staff is at this hotel. The corner suite we stayed in was very comfortable for us 3. We had a great time here. Its very close to the shops and restaurants in Bercy Village. Metro Station is close by. 10 - 15 min by Metro to most of Paris main attractions. I really recommend this place. We enjoyed our stay here very much.
ASK for Julian ... he is just FANTASTIC.
Room Tip: Double room Suite was great. We stayed on floor 10. Corner Suite with a great view ... .Very quite... See more room tips Green Features: I love the fragrance they have throughout the hallways of the HOTEL. Beautiful
